name: Midnight Harvest
description:
This is my first game in this engine (Bitsy) as well as
my first Game Jam that I have joined. It was super
exciting to work in a new enviroment. 

The theme was Harvest. I approached this theme
with a story of magical character known as Death
(character inspired by Terry Pratchet's - Mort)
who is struggling to find anything interesting
in his job other than killing people. 

I would like to thank my friend, Atri
who composed the short track you can hear
while playing the game.
And also to the Bitsy discord community
without which I would not be able to finish 
this project. Thank you.

I hope you enjoy. 

(:
